patterns: I submitted my timesheet incorrect. What do I do?
responses: Don’t panic! You can fix your approved timesheet if you submitted it in the wrong week or if there was an error in the entry. The first step is to contact your Timesheet Approver and ask them to reject your timesheet.Once rejected,  you can re-submit the timesheet again.

patterns: Not able to fill the timesheet
responses: Please check your allocations. Navigate to  Everest homepage to find the Staffing Manager of your project and request for allocation. Once allocation is Approved you will be able to fill the timesheet.

responses: For recieving GALE day, fill the timesheet for that Quarter and ontime submission is required. Only two missed late submissions are allowed per Quarter. Please reach out to everestops@galepartners.com for further queries.
Birthday leave can be applied through Everest homepage and Everest profile page. Birthday leave is to be applied on +/-3 days of your birth date.

patterns: How do I log a sick leave?
responses: a)Go to Everest homepage and choose Timesheet from the hamburger menu. b)Click on ‘Add Row’ to get the client drop down.c)Choose the respective client and project from the Client and Project dropdown. d)For GALE Employees select PID 10738. e)For Assembly Employees select PID 12136. f) Please make sure to select the PID and add a Memo while submitting your timesheets for the sick day.

patterns: How do I submit any other time off for GALE Employees?
responses: Any request for other time off which doesn’t fall under your regular vacation policy or GALE Days needs to be submitted directly to HR. For cases such as bereavement leave, short/long-term disability, or critical illness leave, Parental and Maternity leave Please contact hr@galepartners.com
